metadata.title: Corruptbox - Play Free Online Music Creation Game | Inspired by Incredibox
metadata.description: Create amazing music with Corruptbox, a Sprunki-powered music creation game inspired by Incredibox. Mix beats, create unique soundscapes, and share your musical masterpieces. Play free online, no download required.
metadata.keywords: Corruptbox, Incredibox mod, Sprunki game, music creation game, online music maker, beat maker, music composition, Incredibox alternative, free music game

home.title: Corruptbox
home.subtitle: Create Music Like Never Before
home.mainDescription: Welcome to Corruptbox, an innovative music creation platform inspired by Incredibox. Blend beats, create melodies, and discover new soundscapes with our Sprunki-powered interface. Perfect for both beginners and experienced music makers.

introduction.title: What Makes Corruptbox Special?
introduction.content: Corruptbox takes the beloved concept of Incredibox to new heights with enhanced sound design and creative freedom. Our Sprunki-powered platform combines intuitive controls with professional-grade sound mixing capabilities, making it the perfect tool for creating unique musical compositions. Whether you're a fan of Incredibox or new to music creation, Corruptbox offers an engaging and rewarding experience.

features.title: Explore Corruptbox Features
items: Rich Sound Library: Extensive collection of Sprunki-crafted sounds and beats
Intuitive Interface: Easy-to-use controls inspired by Incredibox's simplicity
Advanced Mixing: Create complex harmonies with professional-grade mixing tools
Creative Freedom: Unlimited possibilities for musical expression
Community Sharing: Connect with other Corruptbox and Incredibox enthusiasts

steps.title: Getting Started with Corruptbox
items: Choose Your Sounds: Select from our Sprunki-designed sound collection to start your composition
Mix and Match: Combine different elements to create your unique Corruptbox masterpiece
Layer Your Beats: Build complex rhythms inspired by Incredibox's layering system
Fine-tune Your Mix: Perfect your creation with Corruptbox's advanced mixing tools
Share and Inspire: Let your music inspire the Corruptbox community

community.title: Join the Corruptbox Community
community.content: Corruptbox has grown into a vibrant community of music creators, bringing together fans of Incredibox and new artists alike. Our platform builds on the creative spirit that made Incredibox famous, while adding unique Sprunki-powered features that take music creation to the next level.

tips.title: Master Corruptbox
items: Start Simple: Learn Corruptbox basics before complex compositions
Explore Sounds: Try all Sprunki-designed sound elements
Study Others: Learn from popular Corruptbox creations
Practice Daily: Develop your unique Corruptbox style
Engage & Share: Join the Corruptbox community

updates.title: What's New in Corruptbox
updates.content: Experience the latest Corruptbox updates featuring new Sprunki-designed sounds, enhanced mixing capabilities, and exciting community events. Regular updates ensure your music creation journey stays fresh and inspiring.
